newsitem.title: POLAND: ANDRZEJ DOROSZ TO HEAD POLISH BANK PEKAO SA.
newsitem.headline: ANDRZEJ DOROSZ TO HEAD POLISH BANK PEKAO SA.

text.p: The supervisory board of state-owned Polish Bank Pekao SA chose the bank's deputy president Andrzej Dorosz as new chief executive on Saturday, PAP news agency reported.

"(On Saturday) the supervisory board of Bank Pekao SA chose unanimously in a secret ballot Andrzej Dorosz as President of the bank," PAP quoted Teresa Klusek, head of the President's office, as saying.
She said the bank chose Dorosz, who was the only candidate, after the National Bank of Poland, the central bank, cleared the choice.
The bank's previous president Marian Kanton died in a road accident last month.
